titleStmt.title: A glimpse of some truths to be made known in these last times in three particulars / by Thomas Royle.
titleStmt.author: Royle, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: "Shewing, I. The end and use of all external ordinances, II. The nature of the spiritual death and resurrection, III. The Day of Judgment, what it is, and when it is."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
